ygData.subject: RE: RE: centaur armor
ygData.msgSnippet: The aviark charm gets you the gauntlets and you need two star rubies and they cost about 87 plat a piece ... From:	Steve Wallace [mailto:tombor@aros.net] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
The aviark charm gets you the gauntlets and you need two star rubies and
they cost about 87 plat a piece

-----Original Message-----
From: Steve Wallace [mailto:tombor@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 3:29 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor

From: "Steve Wallace" <tombor@...>

what piece of armor do you get with the aviak charm and also
what is the
cost in gems?
----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Harrell <jharrell@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 2:00 PM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor

a nice

that the exp
gain
